# Axiom - Financial Services Static Data System

> A modular monolith financial services platform for managing static data including countries, currencies, entities,
> financial instruments, accounts, and settlement instructions. Built with Go (Gin/Fiber/GORM), Next.js, PostgreSQL,
> and RabbitMQ with integrated Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) data acquisition from GLEIF.

Axiom implements a CQRS architecture pattern with JWT authentication, comprehensive API documentation, and
multi-environment deployment support (dev, UAT, production). Key features include automated LEI data synchronization,
WebSocket support, rate limiting, Prometheus metrics, and containerized deployment via Docker Compose.
